message: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
Families are like branches on a tree. We grow in different directions yet our roots remain as one.
A good friend doesn't tell you what you want to hear, but tells you what you need to hear.
Don't believe those who tell you they love you, believe those who show you they do.
